text: That’s what we have done. It is slightly agonizing… definitely worth creating as much of your app as possible via the API so that keeping them in sync is less awful.

How are you using the FORM API to send data from a client's web form to post into the HubSpot Form? If so, would be very thankful for any tips/assistance.  Struggling to get a web form that is urlencoded to post as JSON to the HubSpot form since it only accepts JSON format
